content: b&bw hand sanitizer holder thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking finished size fits a hand sanitizer from bath and body works materials dk/light worsted #3 yarn scissors 3 25mm hook keyring needle hand sanitizer gauge i will walk you through how to get a proper sizing stitches us terms slip_stitch -slip_stitch half_double_crochet -half_double_crochet skip -skip blo -back loops only space -space decrease -decrease st -stitch in 3rd loop tutorial here -no chain -chain affiliation- single_crochet -single_crochet pattern notes this pattern is constructed in one piece this pattern is worked in joining rounds designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items hand sanitizer holder chain 15 join to first chain to make a circle round 1 chain 1 in your circle place 24 single_crochet join check to make sure your circle is just barely smaller than your hand sanitizer and that you can open the lid if the size is good then move onto r2 if the size is too big frog and redo with less starting chains for circle and then do the 24 single_crochet into the circle if the size is too small frog and redo with a 3 75mm or 4mm hook until you can get the hole big enough continue to use this hook size for the rest of the pattern round 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st join round 3 in 3rd loop single_crochet in each st join round 4 chain 3 counts as double_crochet 2dc in same st *skip 2 3dc in next st* 7 times join to top of chain 3 round 5 chain 1 *10 single_crochet decrease* twice join 22 round 6 chain 1 *half_double_crochet chain 1 skip st* around join to first half_double_crochet round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in each st and chain space around join round 8 chain 1 in blo single_crochet in each st join round 9 chain 18 or however long you want your hanging strap to be slip_stitch in same st as join *slip_stitch in next st chain 1* 10 times slip_stitch in next chain 6 slip_stitch in same st as last slip_stitch *sl st in next st chain 1* 11 times join in first slip_stitch fasten_off weave in ends insert your hand sanitizer then thread the big loop through the small loop and attach keyring to the large loop hang where desired
